General.Name: Arkha Jayanti Persada PT
General.Description: PT Arkha Jayanti Persada Tbk manufactures and fabricates heavy equipment components in Indonesia. It fabricates excavators, bulldozers, motor graders, wheel mining loaders, and dump trucks; and provides various oil and gas industrial equipment, such as pipe racks, pipe shoes, and connector pipes, as well as coal transportation services. The company also offers steel construction for power plants, factories and buildings, railway stations, and railway bridges; and manufactures transportation vehicle equipment. PT Arkha Jayanti Persada Tbk was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Arkha Jayanti Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Arkha Tanto Prima.
